name: JavaUtils
description: Utility functions for creating and interacting with common Java objects and arrays. Accessible from scripts via the global `JavaUtils` variable.

methods.name: createArrayList
methods.description: Creates a new Java ArrayList. Can optionally be initialized with a JavaScript array.

parameters.name: array
parameters.description: An optional JavaScript array to initialize the list with.

methods.name: createHashMap
createHashSet
getRandom
methods.description: Creates a Java random number generator, optionally seeded.

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description: An optional seed to initialize the random number generator. Using the same seed will produce the same sequence of random numbers.

methods.name: getHelperFromRaw
methods.description: Wraps a raw Minecraft object into its corresponding JSMacros helper object.

parameters.name: raw
parameters.description: The raw Minecraft object to wrap.

methods.name: arrayToString
methods.description: Converts an array to a string representation, similar to Java's Arrays.toString().

methods.name: arrayDeepToString
methods.description: Converts a nested array to a string representation, similar to Java's Arrays.deepToString().

parameters.name: array
parameters.description: The array to convert, which may contain other arrays.
